victoryCutscene.speaker: Narrator
victoryCutscene.text: The last cultist falls and our heroes approach the man in the chair.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Narrator
victoryCutscene.text: The man stirs, and we see a terrible scar across his throat. He appears to be mute.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Narrator
victoryCutscene.text: Surprisingly, it's the bird who speaks!

victoryCutscene.speaker: Dante & Inferno
victoryCutscene.text: Squawk! Boy are we glad to see you! Showed up just in time, yes you did.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Dante & Inferno
victoryCutscene.text: You can call me Inferno. Tall, Dark, and Handsome over here is Dante.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Ty
victoryCutscene.text: This is the coolest vibe I've ever seen...

victoryCutscene.speaker: Veil
victoryCutscene.text: And you'll be our employer I take it?

victoryCutscene.speaker: Dante & Inferno
victoryCutscene.text: Right you are! Looking for revolutionaries is what we're doing.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Dante & Inferno
victoryCutscene.text: Sparkworks is being occupied by organized thugs.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Dante & Inferno
victoryCutscene.text: A set of cultists called The Hushed Choir, and their mercenary group The Ledgermen.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Dante & Inferno
victoryCutscene.text: We're looking for folks willing to help the resistance!

victoryCutscene.speaker: Arden
victoryCutscene.text: Well, that sounds like a chance to be a hero. And look good doing it!

victoryCutscene.speaker: Quin
victoryCutscene.text: And it pays? I find myself between Fortunes, at the moment.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Dante & Inferno
victoryCutscene.text: Coin? Sure, we can pay coin. Or we can negotiate a stake.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Dante & Inferno
victoryCutscene.text: Help us help these people, and be part of building what comes next.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Thorn
victoryCutscene.text: The rope that guides the ox to water is the same rope that drags it to slaughter. Yes, we will help.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Dante & Inferno
victoryCutscene.text: Great. The resistance is gathering at the chapel of the All Hammer.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Dante & Inferno
victoryCutscene.text: Make your way there and speak to Sister Elarra.

victoryCutscene.speaker: Dante & Inferno
victoryCutscene.text: But be careful, the streets are crawling with Cultists and Ledgermen!
